products.name: JET SET EYES KAJAL EYELINER
products.description: The LIT Matte Nail Enamels by MyGlamm promise super long wear time, guaranteeing endless nights of fun with your digits—whether it’s in real time or some good ol’ sexting. Nothing sets the mood quite like the frosty matte finish of polished nails. We’ve used a formula that improves colour payoff, enhances brightness and mattifies in seconds —time to put those nails to good use.

products.name: VACATION-READY MAKEUP COMBO
products.description: Whether it's the holiday season or a vacation for no reason, always be ready to bring out your best with Manish Malhotra Vacation-Ready Makeup Combo! Accentuate your finest features with Manish Malhotra Face & Body Highlighter. Draw attention to your eyes with Manish Malhotra Glitter Eyeliner.

products.name: GEL FINISH NAIL LACQUER
products.description: You’ve got that summer-ready manicure with the perfect shape. Dress your nails up in summer sophistication with Manish Malhotra Gel Finish Nail Lacquer by MyGlamm. Featuring 20 luxe pastel shades inspired by all things summer, with a hi-shine, gel finish. Its non-toxic, quick-drying formula delivers salon-ready nails in a single stroke

products.name: POSE HD BANANA POWDER
products.description: Wake & Bake like the queen of contouring, Kim K with the POSE Banana Powder by MyGlamm. This yellow powder mattifies and sets your makeup, giving your skin a natural radiance for a picture-perfect look. Your skin’s superhero, it controls shine, blurs fine lines, prevents creasing, colour corrects visible redness, evens out your complexion

products.name: COMBO OF 3 LIT NAIL ENAMEL
products.description: The glossy LIT Nail Enamels by MyGlamm promise super long-wear time, guaranteeing endless nights of fun with your digits—whether it’s in real time or some good ol’ sexting. Nothing sets the mood quite like the smooth wet finish of glistening bright nails.

products.name: SUPER SERUM BB CREAM - 201 PINE - 15G
products.description: Powered by magical Hyaluronic Acid, which can hold 1000X its weight in water, to retain skin moisture as well as add bounce and suppleness. This BB cream is infused with Niacinamide that helps fade dark spots and antioxidant-rich Kakadu Plum that gives your skin a natural glow. The cream formula provides a non-cakey, natural-looking, radiant finish.

products.name: POPXO MAKEUP - SEND NOODS - 4 EYESHADOW KIT
products.description: For all you divas on-the-go, this mini eyeshadow palette is perfect for beginners as well as professional makeup artists. Easy to use and intensely pigmented, this formula delivers a rich colour payoff in just one swipe. But that's not it! You can also use this multi-tasking eye shadow kit for contouring, highlighting and adding a flush of colour to your cheeks.

products.name: LIPSTICK + LIT VELVET MATTE LIQUID LIPSTICK
products.description: A smooth, creamy mousse formula, MyGlamm LIT Velvet Matte Liquid Lipstick is poppin’ with pigment. This true matte gives one swipe pigmentation for super-saturated payoff. Infused with vitamin E and silicone oils, the moisturising matte glides on the lips for a comfy and cushy feel.

products.name: K.PLAY FLAVOURED BLUSH - FROZEN RASPBERRY
products.description: Flavoured Blush by MyGlamm. Infused with fresh fruity flavours, this mattifying blush lasts really long and gives you that healthy, flushed look. And, don’t worry about patchiness, it’s smooth blending all the way.

products.name: POSE HD SETTING POWDER - IVORY
products.description: Get ready to take centre stage anytime, anywhere with the POSE Setting Powder by MyGlamm, your cheat code to flawless skin. This high definition translucent setting powder brightens and evens out your skin. It also hydrates, protects your skin from pollution and blurs fine lines and imperfections.

products.name: LIT LIQUID MATTE LIPSTICK + SUPERFOODS KAJAL
products.description: You found The One! Trust us, ladies, this liquid matte lipstick will be your new love! The LIT Liquid Matte Lipstick by MyGlamm gives you soft, kiss-proof lips, no smudges or transfers, just pure, intense colour! Best of all, its enriched with Moringa Oil that moisturises and smoothens dry, damaged lips.

products.name: STAY DEFINED LIQUID EYELINER BROW POWDER
products.description: Stay Defined 2 in 1 eyeliner and brow powder adds definition and depth to your eye game. Dramatic wing tips or minimal clean lines, the new and improved smart tip gives you all the control. The high-definition brow powder gives you fuller, sculpted eyebrows in just a few strokes. We promise all eyes will be on you!

products.name: POSE HD LIPSTICK & K.PLAY LIPGLOSS
products.description: POSE Camera Ready HD Makeup - India’s first HD makeup line designed with Optical Blurring Technology especially for Indian skin tones.

products.name: LIT LIP & EYE SPARKLES
products.description: little bling goes a long way to make you the queen of the night. We're bringing the runway into real life with colour saturated grown up glamour, via our LIT Lip & Eye Sparkles by MyGlamm. Get cheeky and adventurous with just the right balance of shine and substance and layer it on to get immaculate, glittery, saturated lips worth dying for.

products.name: FLAWLESS FINISH - DUSKY
products.description: An all-in-one foundation with a long-lasting formula that fuses primer and foundation in one easy step! An amazing combination product for a flawless base that provides sheer to full buildable coverage. It includes a primer that prolongs wear for impeccable results. Also in the palette are two color correctors, yellow and orange, to smooth away small imperfections, uneven skin tone, discolorations and dark circles.

products.name: TOTAL MAKEOVER FF CREAM FOUNDATION PALETTE - HONEY
products.description: Honey - perfect for medium and warm-beige to medium-golden complexions. It pairs best with Warm Skin Tones on the yellow, peachy or golden spectrum. It is also PETA Approved cruelty-free and vegan.

products.name: SPOTLIGHT ILLUMINATING LIQUID - STARDUST
products.description: The easiest way to glowing, healthy-looking skin starts with MyGlamm's Spotlight. One drop of this strobing liquid lends your skin a natural, dewy radiance. Enriched with Instant Remodelling technology it acts on the skin's natural lifting properties to give you that heavenly glow – instantly!

products.name: PURE LOVE SINDOOR - ROYAL MAROON
products.description: The pious essence of tradition blended with a contemporary, long-lasting formula results in this liquid sindoor — an everyday essential for the modern, Indian woman. Infused with soothing Sandalwood fragrance, MyGlamm Pure Love Sindoor is designed with a brush-tip applicator. High-pigment colour that dries quick and doesn’t smudge, fade or crease — making it ideal for everyday use. Free from hazardous ingredients like Lead and Mercury.

products.name: BESTSELLER LIPSTICK DUO
products.description: ‘The Art of Gifting’ collection. It contains two of our bestselling lipstick shades – Manish Malhotra Hi-Shine Lipstick in Vintage Wine and Manish Malhotra Soft Matte Lipstick in Blush Rose. Packed in an elegant matte-black and gold gift box, this luxurious lipstick combo takes your lips from 0 to 100 in a single stroke

products.name: STARRY SOIRÈE MAKEUP KIT
products.description: Gracefully packed in an elegant matte-black and rose gold gift box, this beauty gift kit contains Manish Malhotra Face & Body Highlighter - Blaze for the ultimate glow goddess look; Manish Malhotra 9 in 1 Eyeshadow Palette - Enchanté for eyes that steal the spotlight. For the lips, go ultra-matte with Manish Malhotra Liquid Matte Lipstick - Crazier Than Pink or be the gloss queen with Manish Malhotra Hi-Shine Lipstick - Moroccan Red and Manish Malhotra Hi-Shine Lipgloss - Gold Dust. Now, look no further and treat yourself and your loved ones with this show-stopping makeup gift set.

products.name: GLITTER MASCARA TOPCOAT
products.description: Glitter Mascara Topcoat by MyGlamm is just the drama you need to go full glamm! The special gel formula is made with ingredients known for their soothing and softening properties. While you're at it, gilt your brows as well.

products.name: name22
products.description: Be Easy On The Eyes with this combo, which has two of our best selling products - Powder Magic in Smoky Quartz and Stay Defined Liquid Eyeliner + HD Brow Powder. Powder Magic in Smoky Quartz is a shimmery brown eyeshadow pencil that's super-easy to apply. Just fill in your lids and voila!—you're all glammed up! Stay Defined has a black Liquid Eyeliner to define the eyes and an HD Brow Powder for naturally fuller brows.

products.name: SHARP EYES- AQUAMARINE
products.description: Powder Magic is an innovative pressed powder in a jumbo pencil form. It allows you to create dramatic or natural eyeshadow looks with ease and precision. Its smouldering formula adds depth and dimension to your eyes in seconds. A shimmery pressed powder shadow, in gorgeous hues, sweeps across lids, over and under lash lines making your eyes appear sultry and smouldering instantly.

products.name: EYE IT MAKEUP KIT
products.description: It's the IT Kit that's all the rage on and off the runway. You can't go wrong with it. It includes Manish Malhotra Beauty by MyGlamm Mascara in Dark Knight and Glitter Eyeliner in Dazzle.

products.name: COMBO OF 2 GEL FINISH NAIL LACQUER
products.description: Gel Finish Nail Lacquer by MyGlamm. Featuring 20 luxe pastel shades inspired by all things summer, with a hi-shine, gel finish. Its non-toxic, quick-drying formula delivers salon-ready nails in a single stroke. Get that glossy gel look on the go with long-lasting shine! From classic nudes and sandy pinks to pistachio greens and calm blues, explore the shades of summer with Manish Malhotra Beauty.

products.name: MOROCCAN ARGAN HAIR SHAMPOO, 300ML
products.description: Moroccan Argan Shampoo is created using natural ingredients and plant extracts. It thoroughly cleanses the scalp without leaving residue. This Moroccan Argan Oil Shampoo leaves your hair smooth and frizz-free while giving it naturally-powered nourishment and care for soft, manageable hair. It also helps remove dandruff from your scalp.

products.name: UPERFOODS CACAO, COCONUT & COFFEE SHAMPOO - 200ML
products.description: Is flaky and itchy scalp stealing your hair’s natural shine? Recharge them with MyGlamm SUPERFOODS Cacao, Coffee, & Coconut Shampoo. The star ingredient - Cacao offers unparalleled moisturisation and zinc pyrithione helps in treating Dandruff. This shampoo also has Coffee extracts which stimulate blood flow for healthy hair growth. Treats frizzy hair with the nourishing action of Cold Pressed Coconut Oil that completes the holy trio of this cleansing formula. Get ready to flaunt shinier, smoother, and stronger hair every day.

products.name: ORIENTAL BOTANICS BHRINGRAJ & AMLA HAIR SHAMPOO, 300ML
products.description: Bhringraj & Amla are the key ingredients to healthy hair growth. Selected from your grandma’s favourite recipe, the formulation contains premium natural ingredients that are boasted to keep the hair thick and lustrous. The effective ingredients will gently clear your scalp without disturbing the natural moisture barrier of your scalp. It will also prevent your hair from natural wear & tear to reduce premature breakage and split ends. Infused with natural Vitamins, Minerals & Amino Acids, it will also help infuse strength into your follicles and prevent hair fall.

products.name: PASSION FRUIT & ROSEMARY SHAMPOO 300ML
products.description: Tired of dealing with dry, dull hair that’s lost its shine from heat styling, hair colour and pollution? Supercharge your tresses with the MyGlamm SUPERFOODS Passion Fruit & Rosemary Shampoo. Enriched with nourishing natural extracts from the superfoods passion fruit and rosemary, this mild yet powerful formulation works on your hair from the root to restore its natural shine and lustre, for hair that looks gorgeous and feels silky-smooth. The restorative properties of rosemary help reverse damage to reveal hair that feels healthy.

products.name: MYGLAMM SUPERFOODS ONION & MORINGA CONDITIONER - FLAT PRICE
products.description: This Onion Hair conditioner is uniquely formulated with all-natural, superfood ingredients, handpicked for their efficacy. The nutrition-rich Onion Conditioner replenishes and strengthens your hair, combats hair breakage, and keeps them soft. High concentrations of onion seed oil in this hair conditioner deeply nourishes hair and promotes hair health. Moringa, a powerful superfood, strengthens & smoothens hair without drying them. Shea butter, an added ingredient in this hair conditioner, detangles and quenches dry, damaged hair while repairing split ends and restoring shine to it.

products.name: MYGLAMM SUPERFOODS ONION & MORINGA CONDITIONER - 200ML
products.description: his Onion Hair conditioner is uniquely formulated with all-natural, superfood ingredients, handpicked for their efficacy. High concentrations of onion seed oil in this hair conditioner deeply nourishes hair and promotes hair health. Moringa, a powerful superfood, strengthens & smoothens hair without drying them.

High concentrations of onion seed oil in this hair oil deeply nourishes roots, stimulates them, and promote hair health. The onion seed oil is extracted using the cold press extraction method which ensures that the nutrients remain intact all the way from the bottle to your scalp.

products.name: SUPERFOODS ONION & MORINGA SERUM - 100ML

products.description: This combo of shampoo, conditioner and hair oil is uniquely formulated with all-natural, superfood ingredients, handpicked for their efficacy. products.name: SUPERFOODS SUPER HAIR NOURISHER
products.description: A super effective nourishing and strengthening duo! products.name: MOROCCAN ARGAN HAIR SERUM, 120ML
products.description: Moroccan Argan Hair Serum is developed using premium natural oils and plant-based ingredients. This Moroccan Oil serum ensures smooth and shiny hair. This dry hair serum helps moisturise dry hair without making it greasy, and makes hair smooth and glossy.

products.name: WATERMELON & ALOE BODY WASH 300ML

products.name: name50

products.name: MYGLAMM CACAO & BERRIES SHOWER GEL WITH SUPERFOODS POUCH

All-in-all, the Cacao & Berries shower gel will make sure that you have a refreshing shower experience every single time.

products.name: WIPEOUT GERM KILLING SOAP - 75G

products.name: 24X7 GERM PROTECTION
products.description: Shield yourself from germs, infections, and other nasties with the 24x7 Germ Protection WIPEOUT Safety Kit. products.name: OSE AND STRAWBERRY BRIGHTENING BEAUTY BAR SET OF 2
products.description: Supercharge your skin with MyGlamm Rose & Strawberry Brightening Beauty Bar. This rose-shaped soap bar will surely lift up your spirits, keeping it baby soft throughout the day.

products.name: MYGLAMM WIPEOUT HYDRATED SKIN TRIO
products.description: Be 100% summer-ready with MyGlamm WIPEOUT Hydrated Skin Trio. Take a rejuvenating shower with MyGlamm WIPEOUT Germ Killing Soap - Rose & Honey. products.name: GLOW IRIDESCENT BRIGHTENING BODY LOTION
products.description: A calming and soothing body moisturiser, the GLOW Iridescent Brightening Body Lotion by MyGlamm melts into your skin leaving it iridescent and dewy. Rosehip oil forms a natural skin barrier which prevents dryness.

Because whatever your love language may be, these 5 fascinating fragrances have your back.

products.name: WIPEOUT GERM KILLING FOOT CREAM - 60G

products.name: WIPEOUT GERM KILLING BODY WASH - LAVENDER & NEEM
products.description: Kickstart your mornings with our refreshing and protective Germ Killing Body Wash, an invigorating formula enriched with germ-killing chlorhexidine; that protects you from germs, for clean and refreshed skin. This purifying body wash is also formulated with natural extracts.

products.name: POPXO SHEET MASK PACK OF 2
products.description: With natural favourites and skin gredient heroes combined, this soothing sheet mask leaves you worry-free and glowing. 20-minute solution to resolve redness, irritated skin and reduce dullness, pigmentation caused by sun exposure.

products.name: GLOW IRIDESCENT BRIGHTENING SHEET MASK

products.name: WIPEOUT GERM KILLING FACE WASH - LAVENDER & NEEM

It is a unique formula with germ-killing chlorhexidine; that gets rid germs resulting in clean and refreshed skin. This revitalizing face wash is also formulated with natural extracts.

products.name: POPXO FIRST KISS LIP BALM SPF 15
products.description: No skin routine is complete without lip protection. If you’re stopping SPF application at just your skin - it’s time to do better (don’t worry, we’re here to help). The POPxo First Kiss Lip Balm SPF 15 is all you need to be both sun-kissed and kiss-ready.

products.name: YOUTHFULL HYDRATING SLEEPING MASK WITH WATER BANK TECHNOLOGY
